title: 95/236/EC: Commission Decision of 26 June 1995 amending Decision 87/119/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 June 1995 amending Decision 87/119/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community (Text with EEA relevance) (95/236/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 87/119/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 June 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 49, 18. 2. 1987, p. 37.
(3) OJ No L 22, 27. 1. 1994, p. 51.
ANNEX
LIST OF ESTABLISHMENTS
